mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_prescription ( prs_code, cln_code, prs_descr, med_code, med_code2, med_code3 ) VALUES ( 'R' || LPAD(seq_prescriptioc.NEXTVAL, 5, '0') , #{clnCode} , #{prsDescr} , #{medCode} , #{medCode2} , #{medCode3} )
mapper.select: SELECT cln_code , pat_code , emp_id , cln_date , cln_descr FROM tb_clinic WHERE cln_code=#{clnCode}

SELECT prs_code, cln_code, prs_descr, med_code, (select med_codename from tb_med_codename where med_code = b.med_code) as med_codename, med_code2, (select med_codename from tb_med_codename where med_code = b.med_code2) as med_codename2, med_code3, (select med_codename from tb_med_codename where med_code = b.med_code3) as med_codename3, pat_code, pat_name FROM ( SELECT rownum as rnum, frm.* FROM ( SELECT a.prs_code, a.cln_code, a.prs_descr, a.med_code, a.med_code2, a.med_code3, b.pat_code, c.pat_name FROM tb_prescription a , tb_clinic b , tb_patient c WHERE 1=1 and a.cln_code = b.cln_code and b.pat_code = c.pat_code
ORDER BY prs_code DESC ) frm ) b WHERE rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
SELECT prs_code , cln_code , prs_descr , med_code , med_code2, med_code3 FROM tb_prescription
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM tb_prescription a , tb_clinic b , tb_patient c WHERE 1=1 AND a.cln_code = b.cln_code AND b.pat_code = c.pat_code
SELECT prs_code , cln_code , prs_descr , med_code , med_code2 , med_code3 FROM tb_prescription WHERE prs_code = #{prsCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_prescription SET prs_code =#{prsCode}, AND cln_code =#{clnCode}, AND prs_descr =#{prsDescr}, AND med_code =#{medCode}, AND med_code2 =#{medCode2}, AND med_code3 =#{medCode3} WHERE prs_code =#{prsCode}
